atk-abh03a64:1_1: Idāni kusalādīsu dhammesu paccayadhammaṁ appaṭikkhipitvā paccayuppannassa kusalādibhāvapaṭikkhepavasena
atk-abh03a64:1_2: dhammānaṁ anulomapaccanīyatāya laddhanāmaṁ anulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ dassetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
atk-abh03a64:1_3: na kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a64:1_4: Tattha kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiccāti kusalassa paccayabhāvaṁ anujānāti.
atk-abh03a64:1_5: Na kusalo dhammo uppajjatīti kusalasseva uppattiṁ vāreti.
atk-abh03a64:1_6: Tasmā ‘‘kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpa’’ntiādinā nayena vissajjanaṁ dassitaṁ,
atk-abh03a64:1_7: taṁ sabbaṁ pāḷiṁ oloketvā sādhukaṁ sallakkhetabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a64:1_10: yo ca yesaṁ vissajjanānaṁ yesu paccayesu gaṇanaparicchedo,
atk-abh03a64:7_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttagāthāya dīpitā dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhāne cha nayā niddiṭṭhā honti.
atk-abh03a64:7_1: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṁ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṁ
